mapper.select: SELECT r.no,r.user_no userNo, r.service_no serviceNo, r.content, r.reply, r.regdate, u.nick_name userNickName, u.photo_url userPhotoUrl FROM reviews r, users u WHERE r.user_no = u.no AND r.service_no = #{serviceNo} ORDER BY r.regdate DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE reviews SET content = #{content}, reply = #{reply} WHERE no=#{no}
